entry.title: Philippines places four countries under Red List amid COVID-19 pandemic | UB

media:group.media:title: Philippines places four countries under Red List amid COVID-19 pandemic | UB
media:group.media:description:
Malacañang said the government's Inter-Agency Task Force (IATF) has updated its COVID-19 risk classification of countries, placing Grenada, Papua New Guinea, Serbia and Slovenia under its Red List from September 19 to 30.
